RulesElement.name: Group Awareness
RulesElement.specific: Non-elf allies within 5 get +1 to Perception.

RulesElement.name: Elven Accuracy
RulesElement.specific: Use elven accuracy as an encounter power.

RulesElement.name: Fey Origin
RulesElement.specific: Your origin is fey, not natural

RulesElement.name: Wild Step
RulesElement.specific: Ignore difficult terrain when shifting (even when shifting multiple squares).

RulesElement.name: First Strike
RulesElement.specific: At encounter start, get combat advantage against foes that haven't acted yet.

RulesElement.name: Rogue Tactics
RulesElement.specific: Choose one of the rogue tactics.

RulesElement.name: Artful Dodger
RulesElement.specific: Add Cha mod to AC against opportunity attacks.

RulesElement.name: Rogue Weapon Talent
RulesElement.specific: Damage die increases one size with shuriken; +1 on attacks with daggers.

RulesElement.name: Sneak Attack
RulesElement.specific: Once per round, if you have combat advantage and hit with a crossbow, light blade, or sling, deal extra damage.

RulesElement.name: Backstabber
RulesElement.specific: Sneak Attack dice increase to d8s

RulesElement.name: Slaying Action
RulesElement.specific: Deal Sneak Attack damage again with an action point

RulesElement.name: Melee Training (Dexterity)
RulesElement.specific: Use Dexterity for melee basic attacks

RulesElement.name: Distant Advantage
RulesElement.specific: Gain combat advantage with ranged and area attacks against flanked enemies

Weapon.name: Magic Dagger +2
Weapon.HitComponents: +4 Dexterity modifier. +4 half your level. +3 proficiency bonus. +2 enhancement bonus. +1 bonus - Rogue Weapon Talent
Weapon.Conditions: +2d8 to damage once per round (Sneak Attack)

D20Character.textstring: Non-elf allies within 5 get +1 to Perception.
Use elven accuracy as an encounter power.
Your origin is fey, not natural.
Ignore difficult terrain when shifting (even when shifting multiple squares).
At encounter start, get combat advantage against foes that haven't acted yet.
Choose one of the rogue tactics.
Add Cha mod to AC against opportunity attacks.
Damage die increases one size with shuriken; +1 on attacks with daggers.
Once per round, if you have combat advantage and hit with a crossbow, light blade, or sling, deal extra damage.
+2 to initiative and shift quickly during your first turn

Retain elven accuracy on an enemy's miss
Sneak Attack dice increase to d8s
Deal Sneak Attack damage again with an action point
Use Dexterity for melee basic attacks
